title: Producer OS Configuration
description: Schema for Producer OS configuration file.

inbox_path.description: Path to the inbox directory (current GUI/runtime key)

hub_path.description: Path to the hub/destination directory (current GUI/runtime key)

inbox.description: Path to the inbox directory (legacy key; inbox_path is preferred)

hub.description: Path to the hub directory (legacy key; hub_path is preferred)

output_folder_name.description: Name of the organized folder created inside the destination root (for example, Hub or Outbox)

dry_run.description: Whether the GUI/CLI should default to dry-run behavior

preserve_vendor.description: Whether to preserve vendor/pack folder structure when organizing

file_types.description: Enabled file types for GUI processing

loop_safety.description: Whether loop routing safety is enabled

theme.description: UI theme preset (system, studio_dark, paper_light, midnight_blue; dark/light aliases still load)

ui_density.description: UI density mode for spacing and table layout

ui_accent_preset.description: Accent preset id when ui_accent_mode is preset

ui_accent_color.description: Custom accent color (#RRGGBB) when ui_accent_mode is custom

ignore_rules.description: List of file or folder names/prefixes to ignore

normalize_pack_name.description: Whether to normalize pack names when sorting
Whether to normalize pack names when sorting

developer_tools.description: Developer options such as verbose logging
